mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO member m USING (SELECT #{memberEmail} AS member_email, #{memberName} AS member_name, #{gender} AS gender FROM dual) p ON (m.member_email = p.member_email) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET m.member_name = p.member_name WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (member_email, member_name, gender, h_point, account_type) VALUES (p.member_email, p.member_name, p.gender, default, default)
